Name: 23 Ausgewählte Lieder
Notes: Fanny Hensels klavierbegleitete Sololieder, die anonym oder „unter falschem Namen" zu ihren Lebzeiten und teilweise ohne ihr Wissen veröffentlicht wurden.
Long Description: This two-volume publication contains 23 selected songs by Fanny Hensel, accompanied by piano, which were published anonymously or 'under a wrong name' during her lifetime. The volumes include all previously unpublished solo songs by Heinrich Heine, Wilhelm Hensel, and Friederike Robert.
Short Description: A collection of 23 selected songs for soprano and piano by Fanny Hensel, published in two volumes.
